ED_Title: Rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State
ED_DecisionText: At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 12 September 2025, the General Assembly took note of the information provided in paragraph 16 (d) of the report of the General Committee (Footnote: A/80/250.) concerning rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/80/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
